name: Banana Bread
description: from the Alpha Bakery Children's (ABC) cookbook

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oven to 350F. Grease a 9x5x3 loaf pan.
Mix sugar, bananas, oil and eggs in a large bowl with a wooden spoon. Stir in remaining ingredients. Pour into pan.

Bake until a wooden pick inserted in the center of the bread comes out clean (60-70 minutes). Let cool 10 minutes, then loosen sides of loaf from pan and remove from pan. Let cool completely before slicing.
